word:
Spasmodic Repentance 

     "Behold, I stand at the door, and knock: if any man hear My voice, and open the door, I will come in 
                                                                           134
to him, and will sup with him, and he with Me. To him that overcometh will I grant to sit with Me in My throne, even as I also overcame, and am set down with My Father in His throne."
